category: National Team Athletesâ€™ Village Operation Regulations/Article 15 (Application for Temporary Use)
contents: Article 15 (Application for Temporary Use) Temporary users of the athletes' village facilities under Article 14 (hereinafter referred to as *temporary users) must submit the application form in Appendix 1 to the head of the athlete's village 7 days prior to the date of use.
